mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (user_no, user_id, user_pw, user_name, job) VALUES ( member_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{job})
mapper.select: SELECT user_no, user_id, user_pw, user_name, (SELECT code_name FROM code_detail WHERE group_code = 'A00' AND code_value = job) AS job, coin, reg_date FROM member ORDER BY reg_date DESC
SELECT M.user_no, M.user_id, user_pw, user_name, job, coin, reg_date, upd_date, A.auth FROM member M LEFT OUTER JOIN member_auth A ON M.user_no = A.user_no WHERE M.user_no = #{userNo}
SELECT M.user_no, M.user_id, user_pw, user_name, job, coin, reg_date, upd_date, A.auth FROM member M LEFT OUTER JOIN member_auth A ON M.user_no = A.user_no WHERE M.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET user_pw = #{userPw}, user_name = #{userName}, job=#{job} WHERE user_no = #{userNo}
